p: In addition to EVOO, other oils have been treated. The oxidative stability of soybean, rice bran and cottonseed oils added with rosemary extract were tested during 24 days of storage at 62 °C [ 18]. Recently, the oxidative stability of sunflower oil flavored by essential oil from Coriandrum sativum L. during accelerated storage has been studied [ 8]. The effectiveness of the addition of some natural antioxidants (citric acid, ascorbyl palmitate, α-tocopherol, δ-tocopherol, and ascorbic acid) in sunflower oil, stored for different times at different temperatures was studied [ 19].
